ygData.subject: RE: Group or Solo
ygData.msgSnippet: No doubt, they do not con as they should spellcaster or no.  they are basically monks, and monks with spells are therefore really bad, really, really bad.  The
ygData.messageBody:
No doubt, they do not con as they should spellcaster or no. they are
basically monks, and monks with spells are therefore really bad, really,
really bad. The first tiem my squad ring saved my life was to get my
agility back up so I could outrun a green madman spellcaster that spawned on
top of me.

Kitasi "Southern Ro? Bad, very bad..."

-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 2:45 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Group or Solo


From: John Kim <kim@...>

On Wed, 14 Jul 1999 RON_TALBOT@... wrote:
>
> I find that the ability to solo Blues or whites
> depends entirely on the monster. Some blues are easy
> (beetles, lions, orcs) while others are almost sure death
> (aviaks, most spellcasters, undead reavers) The classic
> example of this is bandits. A blue fighter type bandit
> was easy pickings but a blue spell caster bandit was
> death. I usually learn this the hard way... :)

Wait'll you die to a green desert madman. "Hey, he's green, I
need water, so I'll attack him. Oh a spellcaster, eh? What
harm can a green spellcaster do... Why are my hp down to one
and a half bubbles?" :-)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
